description: Transfer from airport to Havelock Island by ferry boat
remarks: Pick up at Port Blair Airport + Drop at jetty to board ferry + Ferry ticket charges+ Pickup at Havelock jetty + Drop to Barefoot resort {11 kms}   Please note that upon arrival at Port Blair by flight, you can proceed straight to Havelock only if your flight lands at Port Blair before 12.00hrs,  as the last ferry from Port Blair to Havelock departs at 1345hrs.

description: Transfer from Havelock Island to Port Blair by ferry
remarks: Drop back to jetty at Havelock + Ferry ticket charges + Pickup from jetty at Port Blair + Drop to chosen hotel in Port Blair (within city limits) + Pickup from hotel (within city limits) + Drop to Airport  On the return journey, from Havelock to Port Blair, you may need to stay the previous night at Port Blair if your flight departs before 14:20hrs as earlier departures are not met in time by returning ferry from Havelock.

description: Transfer from airport to Agonda hotel

Jeep safari in Sasangir National Park
remarks: Safaris in Gir National Park are supposed to be booked 3 months prior to required safari dates. We have taken the highest safari rate, applicable for Festival Dates (Navratri/Diwali/Christmas & New Year) per safari for foreigners.  The park is open from 16 October to 15 June. Best time to visit is definitely late November to early March, when the temperature can drop to a cool 10°C. The summer months are scorching hot, with the temperature hitting 43°C.

Jeep safari in Velavadar National Park
remarks: Entrance fees for a jeep are actually lower on weekdays than on weekends. We have taken the higher amount for our costing.  The park is open throughout the year but mid-June to March is best time to visit.   For bird watchers winter months of December to March are the best time to visit when many migratory birds arrive to spend the winters here.

description: Safari in own vehicle in Velavadar N.P.
Early morning wildlife safari in the Little Rann of Kutch
remarks: The park is open all year; October to March is the best time to visit  For birders: November to February, when it is cooler and migratory birds arrive in the thousands

description: Afternoon bird-watching trip
remarks: Pax should do one jeep safari and one village safari as in that case there is no extra cost. If pax want to do a second safari, then the extra cost is Rs 3,000/- entrance fee per jeep. Entrance fees for a jeep are actually less on weekdays. We have taken the higher amount for our costing.  The park is open all year; October to March is the best time to visit. For birders: November to February, when it is cooler and migratory birds arrive in the thousands.

Visit to a Kalamandalam - a performing arts centre
remarks: Note: The Kerala Kalamandalam is functional on all weekdays except Saturdays and Sundays, Regional holidays, National holidays, Public holidays, Strikes or Hartals. The Kerala Kalamandalam will also be closed for examinations and summer holidays from the end of March and the tour will not be available during the vacation period. Bookings will reopen from the month of June. The school will also be closed for 10 days during Onam holidays and 10 days in December for the Christmas holidays.

April to June is very hot but it is an excellent time for tiger sightings.

Jeep safari in Corbett National Park
remarks: There are four zones that can be visited - Bijrani & Durgadevi (from 01 Oct to 30 June), Jhirna & Sitabani (round the year) & Dhikala Zone (from 15 Nov to 15 May)     Morning safari - from 6 to 10 AM. & Afternoon safari - from 2 to 6 PM.

description: Canter safari to Dhikala
remarks: The canter safari to Dhikala only operates from 15 Nov to 15 May                There are 2 safaris that can be taken in a day -       Morning safari - from 6 to 10 AM.       Afternoon safari - from 2 to 6 PM.              There is a limit in the no of jeeps that can enter the forest in a day.       Therefore we advice you to book the Jungle safari in 4x4 open Gypsies in advance.
